bike.description: Specialized FACT 6r carbon, triple monocoque construction, compact race design

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon fork; carbon legs and steerer
Specialized Mindset Plus, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, cartridge sealed bearings, alloy 20mm cone w/ one 10mm and two 5mm alloy spacers
Specialized Pro-Set lightweight stem, 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt 31.8mm bar clamp, 4- position adjustable
Specialized Expert, 6061 alloy, short-reach drop, ergonomic top shaping, 31.8mm
Body Geometry Bar Phat, cork ribbon w/ 2.5mm gel padding
Specialized Mondo Pro, 700x23C, aramid bead, 120TPI, Flak Jacket
Specialized Mondo Pro, 700x23C, aramid bead, 120TPI, Flak Jacket
Body Geometry Toupé Team, super light foam, carbon reinforced base, microfiber cover
Specialized Pavé FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
